channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: RAM pricing crisis threatens graphics cards – rumor has it some AMD and Nvidia budget GPUs could be scrapped
item.description: Has there ever been a more pressing time to buy a new graphics card? Black Friday could be the last stop before GPU chaos reigns.

item.title: The best wired gaming headset I've ever used is down to a delicious price ahead of Black Friday right now
item.description: If the Arctis Elite is a stretch too far, then this splendid discount on the brilliant SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro wired gaming headset is worth paying attention to

item.title: Scotland vs Denmark free streams: How to watch World Cup 2026 qualifier, TV schedule, preview
item.description: All the ways to watch Scotland vs Denmark live streams online, with McTominay and Damsgaard set to light up the 2026 World Cup qualifying decider at Hampden.

item.title: The world's most popular passwords are pretty unsurprising - surely we can do better?
item.description: Can you guess what the most common passwords are? Yes, you guessed correctly.

item.title: Microsoft intègre des agents IA dans la barre des tâches de Windows 11
item.description: Microsoft veut transformer Windows en « OS agentique », un nouveau buzzword qui cache l'intégration plus profonde de l'IA dans le système d'exploitation. À l'occasion des conférences Lignite, l'éditeur a levé le voile sur une série de fonctions censées concrétiser cette nouvelle stratégie. Cela commence par des agents IA dans la barre des tâches.

item.title: My ultimate Mac mini M4 accessories guide – 9 must-have add-ons for your mini
item.description: Buying an Apple Mac mini M4 this Black Friday? Here's how I kitted out my Mac mini M4 with extra SSD storage, a monitor, trackpad and more.

item.description: Search with Surfshark with this Black Friday VPN deal

item.title: AMD, ARM, INTC, NVDA: Chip stock prices are falling across the board today. Here’s the reason why
item.description: Chipmakers including Nvidia and Intel are down along with much of the stock market Tuesday, as fears of an AI bubble grow. The most closely watched earnings report of the quarter is tomorrow. That’s when AI chipmaking giant Nvidia will announce its third-quarter results. Ahead of those results, Nvidia shares are currently down in Tuesday trading. But NVDA shares aren’t the only chip stock that is falling today....

item.title: Over 60 organizations call on governments worldwide to protect encryption
item.description: The VPN Trust Initiative joins 60+ groups warning governments that weakening encryption threatens global security and the digital economy.

item.description: This Black Friday Deal takes the excellent Logitech G522 Lightspeed headset down to its lowest ever price in the US.

item.title: Think you’re ready for Stranger Things season 5? Take our fan quiz and test your Hawkins knowledge
item.description: How well do you know Stranger Things? Take this 30-question quiz before the final chapter arrives on Netflix to find out.

item.description: The Ninja Luxe Café is one of the best coffee machines around, working with both ground and fresh beans. It's on sale now at a great discount at AO.

item.description: Amazon has a Black Friday sweepstakes, and you can win a $50 gift card – here's how to enter, plus I'm listing today's best early Black Friday deals.

item.title: If you're keen to maintain your Witcher 4 hype levels in 2026, The Witcher in Concert will return to Europe next year and this time it's expanding its venues
item.description: CD Projekt Red has announced that The Witcher in Concert will return to Europe in 2026 by popular demand.

item.description: Quora's AI platform Poe now lets users engage in group chats with up to 200 people across AI models and bots.

item.description: Venture funds have longer timelines than anyone planned for, compelling LPs to rip up and rebuild their allocation models.

item.description: Cynthia Erivo delivers one of the best movie-musical numbers of all time in Wicked: For Good, and I felt like I was defying gravity while watching.

item.title: Bill McKibben says Bill Gates is wrong about climate change—and he’s part of a bigger problem
item.description: The author and activist’s new book highlights that solar and wind has never been cheaper—and identifies the key hurdles to powering America with the sun. In his new book, Here Comes The Sun, author and activist Bill McKibben argues that we’re at a tipping point where solar and wind power is now cheaper to build and harness than fossil fuels. Because of that new economic reality, he argues renewable energy has the power to transform society—if only the U.S. government would listen....

item.title: This AI-powered security camera is just $100 for Black Friday, with solar charging and no sneaky subscription fees
item.description: This innovative security camera has a twisting solar panel that turns to follow the sun, keeping it running for months between charges.

item.title: The Apple Watch Series 11 has plunged to a record low price
item.description: The latest Apple Watch SE impressed us with all of its upgrades this year, but the Apple Watch Series 11 is still the better option if you’re an iPhone owner who requires more advanced health notifications. Thankfully it, like the SE, is now down to a new record-low price, starting at $349.99 ($50 off) at […]

item.title: Google dévoile Gemini 3 et s’attaque de front à ChatGPT 5.1
item.description: Google dévoile Gemini 3, son modèle d’intelligence artificielle le plus avancé à ce jour. Plus performant que jamais, il comprend mieux le texte, les images et les vidéos, automatise des tâches complexes et explose tous les benchmarks.

item.title: What to know about tech’s newest buzzword: ‘agentic’ AI
item.description: Google searches for ‘agentic’ have skyrocketed from near obscurity a year ago to a peak earlier this fall. For technology adopters looking for the next big thing, “agentic AI” is the future. At least, that’s what the marketing pitches and tech industry T-shirts say.

item.title: Valve's Steam Machine could be more powerful than we think – it'll outgun 70% of gaming PCs on Steam anyway
item.description: From the way Valve is spinning the discussion around the specs, I'm inclined to believe this mini PC will be good enough.

item.title: Comment essayer Gemini 3 sur Google en France dès aujourd’hui ?
item.description: Gemini 3 est là. Google a dévoilé ce mardi 18 novembre 2025 le tout nouveau modèle de son chatbot qui va notamment donner vie à son moteur de recherche. Le déploiement débute dès maintenant, y compris sans payer d'abonnement.

item.title: L’iPhone 17 à 849 euros : c’est simple, vous ne trouverez pas moins cher pour le Black Friday [Sponso]

item.description: Sony propose à présent deux modèles de consoles de jeu, la PS5 Slim, venue remplacer le modèle originel, et la PS5 Pro. Quelles sont les différences ? Quelle console PlayStation 5 choisir, pour vous ou pour offrir ? On fait le point dans ce comparatif.

item.title: WhatsApp : une énorme faille expose 3,5 milliards de numéros de mobile, dont le vôtre
item.description: Des chercheurs en sécurité ont mis au jour une faille béante qui leur a permis d’extraire quelque 3,5 milliards de numéros de téléphone d’utilisateurs de WhatsApp.

item.title: Roblox : tous les utilisateurs, y compris les enfants, devront scanner leur visage pour pouvoir discuter
item.description: Pour pouvoir discuter dans Roblox, il va falloir montrer patte blanche. La plateforme de jeux et de communication va en effet vérifier l'âge des utilisateurs pour accéder aux fonctions de discussion, qui est une de ses principales fonctionnalités. Cela va passer par un selfie vidéo.

item.title: Black Friday smartphones pas chers : les Google Pixel et Galaxy S25 tombent sous la barre des 500 euros
item.description: Le Black Friday approche. La rubrique bons plans de Frandroid ne désemplit pas face aux vagues de promotions sur les smartphones. Il n'a jamais été aussi aisé de trouvé un smartphone, même haut de gamme, à moins de 500 euros. Pour vous en convaincre, voici le top des offres.

item.description: Honeycomb Aeronautical, a company that makes flight simulator accessories like flight sticks and pedals that can turn your desk into a cockpit, has announced a compact alternative for PC pilots with limited room. Its upcoming Echo Aviation Controller is about the size of a console gamepad but squeezes standard features like joysticks and buttons to […]...

A widely used Internet infrastructure company said that it has resolved an issue that led to outages impacting users of everything from ChatGPT and the online game “League of Legends,” to the New Jersey Transit system early Tuesday....

item.title: Google Antigravity : ce n’est pas un OS pour développeurs, mais ça y ressemble furieusement
item.description: Tout le monde regarde Gemini 3 et ses scores délirants sur les benchmarks. C'est une erreur. La véritable annonce de Google aujourd'hui s'appelle Antigravity. Ce n'est plus un chatbot, c'est un environnement où l'IA a les mains libres sur votre terminal et votre navigateur. Et ça change tout.

item.title: Mauvaise nouvelle pour l’Apple Watch, les prochains modèles n’auront pas droit à cette nouveauté
item.description: Les amateurs d’Apple Watch qui espéraient découvrir une montre radicalement différente dans les prochaines années vont devoir s’armer de patience. Selon une récente fuite, la prochaine vraie révolution esthétique n’arriverait qu’en 2028.

item.title: Hank Green’s Focus Friend is Google Play’s app of the year
item.description: In a year that again saw AI assistants and tools climb the app store charts over and over, it's interesting to see a timer that helps you disconnect from your tech winning Google's highest app award.

item.title: Meta’s AI spending spree has even the most bullish stock analysts wondering: How much capex is too much?
item.description: The Facebook and Instagram parent is ‘trying to punch above its weight’ as it races to compete with its fellow tech giants, says one Wall Street analyst firm. Meta Platforms has been spending too aggressively on artificial intelligence (AI) infrastructure and that will affect the tech giant’s profitability, according to a new investor note from Wall Street analyst firm MoffettNathanson....

item.title: Microsoft Agent 365 lets businesses manage AI agents like they do people

While Microsoft was founded on the idea of being a software factory, it’s quickly being transformed into an era where AI agents will increasingly take on more human work. Now, Microsoft is launching Agent 365 as […]

item.title: Microsoft’s Office apps are getting even more free AI features

While the software maker has been adding plenty of features to its paid Microsoft 365 Copilot over the past year, a range of free additions are coming to its Office apps in early 2026 that don’t require the $30 per month, per […]

item.title: Google Antigravity is an ‘agent-first’ coding tool built for Gemini 3
item.description: Alongside today’s announcement of Gemini 3 Pro, Google has revealed Antigravity, a development tool that uses Gemini 3 Pro, along with other third-party models. Google says that Antigravity, which supports multiple agents and gives them direct access to the editor, terminal, and browser, is designed for an “agent-first future.” One of the key components of […]...

item.title: The Analogue 3D is the perfect console for N64 collectors
item.description: I've developed a sixth sense for old video game cartridges. I can spot them at flea markets and thrift stores, spy them hidden behind stacks in used book stores. It happened after I first bought an Analogue Pocket, when the hunt for new and interesting Game Boy games became as important as actually playing them. […]

item.title: Google is launching Gemini 3, its ‘most intelligent’ AI model yet
item.description: Google is beginning to launch Gemini 3 today, a new series of models the company says is its “most intelligent” and “factually accurate” AI systems yet. They’re also a chance for Google to leap ahead of OpenAI following the rocky launch of GPT-5, potentially putting the company at the forefront of consumer-focused AI models. For […]

item.title: Microsoft says these new AI tools will help coders avoid tedious tasks and burnout
item.description: New AI features can help developers quickly address security issues and migrate aging software to the cloud. At Microsoft’s Ignite conference on November 18, the company unveiled new AI-powered software features designed to make coders’ lives easier—including a tool to automatically fix security issues as new vulnerabilities are discovered.

item.title: Klarna beats third-quarter revenue estimates in first earnings report after IPO
item.description: The buy now, pay later lender reported revenue of $903 million, beating analysts’ expectations of $882 million. Growth in U.S. markets helped Swedish fintech firm Klarna to achieve a 26% jump in third-quarter revenue, beating expectations in its first report as a public company and forecasting revenue above $1 billion in the current quarter, the company said on Tuesday....

item.title: Stock market slips again as Nvidia, bitcoin, and other stars keep falling
item.description: The struggles are a sharp turnaround from the months of relentless rallying for the U.S. stock market since April. The U.S. stock market is slipping again on Tuesday, following a global sell-off, as Nvidia, bitcoin and other Wall Street stars keep falling on worries that their prices shot too high. Home Depot is also dragging the market lower after saying it made less in profit during the summer than analysts expected....

item.title: Gemini 3 | L’IA de Google promet d’enfin comprendre ce que vous voulez dire
item.description: Google franchit une nouvelle étape dans la course à l’intelligence artificielle. L’entreprise a lancé mardi Gemini 3, son modèle le plus avancé d’IA générative. La nouvelle venue promet de dépasser la simple réponse factuelle et d’agir comme un véritable « partenaire de réflexion », capable de saisir la nuance et le contexte.

item.title: Gemini 3 explose les records : Google affirme avoir doublé GPT-5 et Claude Sonnet 4.5
item.description: Gemini 3 est désormais disponible et Google déploie tous les arguments possibles pour vous convaincre qu'il s'agit du meilleur modèle IA jamais conçu.
